name: Paris
description: Paris is a global center for art, culture, food, and history. Known for its romantic charm, iconic architecture, and world-class museums, Paris offers a blend of historic beauty and modern life along the Seine.

name: Los Angeles
description: Los Angeles is a sprawling coastal city known for entertainment, beaches, diverse food, and creative culture. From Hollywood to Santa Monica, LA mixes urban excitement with relaxed Southern California vibes.

name: New York City
description: New York City is a fast-paced cultural capital known for skyscrapers, world-class shows, iconic parks, and unbeatable food. Each borough offers something unique, from Manhattan’s landmarks to Brooklyn’s creative neighborhoods.
activities: Visit the Metropolitan Museum of Art
